hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above the 20-day high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will signal transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 80% continuation probability over next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during price consolidation near highs suggests accumulation. Breakout with volume confirms institutional participation and regime shift. Historical data shows 72% of such patterns lead to sustained bullish moves.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for 3+ days
BTC breaks above 20-day high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss from entry or return below 20-day high

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If breakout fails to sustain >50% of the time when all conditions are met, or if post-breakout returns are not statistically significant vs. random entries.
